CustomField.description: Static Resource name used to load the brand logo in the Experience (LWR) site. Store the resource name only (not a URL).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the Static Resource name for the logo (example: donut_king_logo). If using a ZIP static resource, you may store a path like brandAssets/logo.png. Leave blank to use a default logo.
CustomField.label: Logo Resource Name
